GSP31ttssarvu:3: śreyaḥ karoti jagatāṃ bhagavantamādyaṃ taṃ śrīmaharṣikapilaṃ prabhumānato 'smi // 1 //
GSP31ttssarvu:8: tata etaiḥ samastatattvānāṃ sakalaṣaṣṭitantrārthānāṃ ca sūcanaṃ bhavati /
GSP31ttssarvu:10: sūtraṣaḍadhyāyī tu vaiśvānarāvatāramaharṣibhagavatkapilapraṇītā iyaṃ tu dvāviṃśatisūtrī tasyā api bījabhūtā nārāyaṇāvatāramaharṣibhagavatkapilapraṇīteti vṛddhāḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:16: tatra mūlaprakṛtiḥ mahattattvam ahaṅkāraḥ śabdatanmātrā sparśatanmātrā rūpatanmātrā rasatanmātrā gandhatanmātrā cetyaṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ santi /
GSP31ttssarvu:17: atra tattvāntarārambhakatvaṃ prakṛtitvam ataśca mahadādīnāṃ saptānāṃ pūrvapūrvavikṛtitve 'pi na atiḥ lakṣaṇasamanvayāt /
GSP31ttssarvu:18: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi manaḥ gaganapavanajvalanasaliladharaṇyākhyāni
GSP31ttssarvu:19: pañca bhūtāni caitāni ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ vikṛtaya eva na tattvāntārārambhakāṇi sarvaṃ
GSP31ttssarvu:22: ayaṃ ca na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ tābhyaḥ pṛthakkṛtya nirūpaṇāt /
GSP31ttssarvu:23: anena jaḍatvapariṇāmitvakartṛtvādidharmavadbhyaḥ prakṛtyādibhyaḥ puruṣasya vailakṣaṇyamapi sūcitaṃ bhavati tathā ca kārikā /
GSP31ttssarvu:25: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ //
GSP31ttssarvu:27: nanvetebhyo 'tiriktā anye 'pi bahavo ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ padārthā dṛśyante tatkathameṣāmupapattirata āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:29: triguṇa eva traiguṇyaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ sañcāraḥ mattakapotakaṇṭhanyāyena pratikṣaṇaṃ vilakṣaṇapariṇāmo varttata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:30: anena mūlaprakṛtistriguṇātmikā tritvena ca bhedabodhakena guṇāḥ parasparaviruddhasvabhāvāḥ
GSP31ttssarvu:31: prītyaprītiviṣādātmakāḥ sañcāreṇa ca saṅgatasamyakcaraṇārthakena teṣāṃ nityasabhāvaḥ
GSP31ttssarvu:34: saṃsiddhiḥ kāryotpādaśca nāpūrvaḥ kintvāvirbhāvamātraṃ sūkṣmakāraṇarūpeṇa sthitasya
GSP31ttssarvu:35: sthūlakāryakṣamarūpeṇa vipariṇāma iti sadvyāptivādaśca ityete siddhāntāḥ saṃsūcitā
GSP31ttssarvu:37: nanu guṇānāmanavaratapariṇatisvabhāvatvāt kadācidapi dṛśyajātādarśanaṃ na syāt tataśca pralayocchedaḥ syādata āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:40: tathā ca pratilomapariṇāmena tattatkāryāṇāṃ svasvakāraṇe laye jāte triguṇāyāḥ prakṛteḥ
GSP31ttssarvu:42: tadā ca samānapariṇāmatvena vailakṣaṇyānāvirbhāva iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP31ttssarvu:45: ātmānamadhikṛtyetyadhyātmam taddvividhaṃ śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ceti śārīraṃ vātapittaśleṣmavaiṣamyanimittaṃ mānasaṃ kāmakrodhalobhamoherṣyāviṣayaviśeṣadarśanādarśananimittam
GSP31ttssarvu:53: nanu satsvapi vilakṣaṇeṣu bahuṣu padārtheṣu puruṣasya tatsambandhābhāvāt kathaṃ tato duḥkhamatastatsāmagrīṃ nirūpayiṣurādau buddhīndriyāṇyāha
GSP31ttssarvu:55: abhito buddhyante jñāyante vastūnyābhirityabhibuddhayaḥ buddhīndriyāṇi cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanatvagākhyāni rūpaśabdagandharasasparśabodhakāni
GSP31ttssarvu:56: anena ca jñānadvārā yogaṃ darśayituṃ karmendriyāṇyāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:58: pañca indriyāṇi karmayonayaḥ karmaṇāṃ vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandānāṃ yonayaḥ kāraṇāni tāni ca vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthākhyāni /
GSP31ttssarvu:61: viṣayagrahāsambhavāt taistadgrahoktyā tāsāṃ nirūpitaprāyatvena tatsādhāraṇī vṛttirāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:63: pañcasaṃkhyākāḥ prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānākhyāḥ vāyavaḥ mahadahaṅkāramanasāṃ sādhāraṇavṛttayaḥ jīvanasādhanāni /
GSP31ttssarvu:68: bhuktapītāhārajalāderasarudhirādeśca yathāyathaṃ prāpaṇameṣāṃ karma tadekānumeyatvena tatsvarūpātmakatā (?) ityarthaḥ // 12 //
GSP31ttssarvu:69: nanvastu jñānakriyādvārā mahadabhimānasarvasaṅkalpānāṃ viṣayayogitvaṃ puruṣasya svapariṇāmitayā tanna ghaṭate ityāśaṅkāṃ vinivartayiṣurāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:71: anātmasvātmakhyātiravidyā sā ca vidyāvirodhinī pañcaparvā bhavati tāni ca parvāṇi avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśākhyāni /
GSP31ttssarvu:72: tathā ca yadavidyayā viparyayeṇāvadhāryate vastu asmitādayastatsvabhāvāstadabhiniviśante tataścātmano vivekena tatsambandha iti bhāvaḥ // 13
GSP31ttssarvu:73: pañcāśadbhedeśu pratyayasargeṣu pañcaviparyayā nirūpitāḥ adhunā viśiṣṭeṣvaṣṭāviṃśatimaśaktimāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:75: indriyavadhā ekādaśa vuddhivadhāśca saptadaśa ityetāḥ aśaktaya ucyante /
GSP31ttssarvu:79: iti buddhivadhāstu navatuṣṭīnāmaṣṭasiddhīnāṃ ca viparyayādbhavanti taditthaṃ jātā aśaktayo 'ṣṭāviṃśatidheti // 14 //
GSP31ttssarvu:84: bāhyāḥ viṣayoparamāt pañca nava tuṣṭayobhihitāḥ // iti
GSP31ttssarvu:85: asyārthaḥ vivekasākṣātkāro hi prakṛtipariṇāmabhedaḥ taṃ ca saiva karotīti kṛtaṃ dhyānābhyāseneti kenacidupadiṣṭe tatra tuṣṭiḥ prakṛtyākhyā 1,
GSP31ttssarvu:86: atha prakṛteḥ sarvān pratyaviśeṣānna kevalaṃ tata eva vivekasākṣātkāraḥ kintu pravrajyayetyupadiṣṭe tuṣṭirupādānākhyā 2,
GSP31ttssarvu:87: pravrajyāpi kālaviśeṣaṇādareṇaiva vivekaṃ janayatyalamuttaptatayā ityupadiṣṭe tuṣṭiḥ kālākhyā 3,
GSP31ttssarvu:91: tata uparamā viratayopi pañca te ca mahadahaṅkārādīnanātmana ātmanobhimanyamānasya
GSP31ttssarvu:93: imāśca nava uktaviparyayāḥ 5 aśaktibhiḥ 28 saha dvicatvāriṃśat 42 siddhiparipanthitvāddheyāḥ // ?// 15 //
GSP31ttssarvu:95: tadyathā ūhaḥ śabdodhyayanaṃ 3 duḥkhavighātāstrayaḥ 6 suhṛtprāptiḥ 7 dānañca 8 siddhayoṣṭāviti
GSP31ttssarvu:96: tatropadeśamantareṇa tattvajñānasya svayamūhādyā asiddhiḥ sā prathamā 1 anyadīyaśāstrapāṭhamākarṇya
GSP31ttssarvu:98: tattvajñāne jāte siddhitrayam 6 jñānavatsuhṛdo lābhena tattvajñāne suhṛtprāptyākhyā
GSP31ttssarvu:99: saptamī 7 dhanādinārādhite jñānini tattvajñāne 'ṣṭamī 8 atra duḥkhavighātarūpāṇāṃ
GSP31ttssarvu:102: heyāḥ siddhayastu upādeyā iti tatsvarūpavyākriyayaiva sūcitaṃ bhavati // 16 //
GSP31ttssarvu:105: daśa arthāḥ padārthāḥ mūlikāḥ santi mūlaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣaśca tāvāśrayatvena vidyete
GSP31ttssarvu:106: yeṣām athavā mūlaṃ svabhāvaḥ sa prayojakatvenāsti yeṣāmiti mūlikā mūlaprakṛtau puruṣe
GSP31ttssarvu:107: ca vidyamānā iti yāvat tathā ca rājavārttikam /
GSP31ttssarvu:109: pārārthyaṃ ca tathā naikyaṃ viyogo yoga eva ca //
GSP31ttssarvu:111: atraikatvamarthavattvaṃ pārārthyaṃ pradhāne anyatvaṃ prakṛtyapekṣayā akartṛtvaṃ bahutvaṃ puruṣe astitvaṃ yogo viyogaścobhayoḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:113: atra prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ sādharmyavaidharmyanirūpaṇena dvayoḥ pārthakyena jñānaṃ prakṛtipuruṣānyatākhyātibījamiti sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP31ttssarvu:114: tathā caiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattatsvabhāvabhūtatvena prakṛtisargatāvyavahāra iti // 17 //
GSP31ttssarvu:115: nanu buddhyādibhireva triguṇātmakaiḥ sakalakāryasiddhau kimadhikaprakṛtyaṅgīkāreṇa ata āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:117: buddhyādibhiḥ svakārye 'haṅkārādau janayitavye prakṛteranugrahasahāyopekṣyate anyathā buddhiḥ kṣīṇā satī nālamahaṅkāraṃ janayitumiti sakalopi sargastadanugrahamūlaka evetyarthaḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:118: ayameva prakṛtyāpūra ityucyate tathā ca prakṛtyaivāyaṃ sargo neśvareṇa nāpi brahmopādāno nāpyakāraṇo neśvarādhiṣṭhitaprakṛtita iti sūcyate //
GSP31ttssarvu:122: taccettham brāhmaprājāpatyaindrapaitragāndharvayākṣarākṣasapaiśācabhedenāṣṭavidho daivaḥ paśumṛgapakṣisthāvarasarīsṛpabhedena pañcavidhastairyagyona ekavidho mānuṣya iti // 19 //
GSP31ttssarvu:123: nanu puruṣārthaśiromaṇībhūtamokṣatattvākāṅkṣā sati bandhasvarūpajñāna evopapadyate 'to bandhānevāha /
GSP31ttssarvu:128: tathā bhūtendriyāhaṅkārabuddhyupāsanaṃ vaikṛtaḥ puruṣatattvamajānataḥ kevalamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇo dākṣiṇa iti trayāṇāmiti puruṣasvarūpavedakatvābhāve bandhakatvam // 20 //
GSP31ttssarvu:131: iṣṭāpūrtādikarmasvasāratāṃ puruṣasvarūpopalabdhereva sāratāṃ buddhyamānasya prathamaḥ tato bhūtendriyādiṣvapi vikāratāṃ tataḥ pṛthagātmānaṃ jānataḥ prakṛtirūpastṛtīyaḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:132: yadyapi prathamadvitīyau na tāttvikamokṣau tathāpyaikadeśikānyatākhyatyā tāvadbandhāpagamena mokṣatvavyavahāra iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP31ttssarvu:133: atra bandhamokṣasaṃsārāḥ prakṛtāveva na puruṣe savāsanakleśakarmāśayānāmapariṇāmini
GSP31ttssarvu:134: puruṣe 'sambhavāt tathā ca bhṛtyajayaparājayayoḥ svāminyupacārāt prakṛtigatānāṃ bandhādīnāṃ
GSP31ttssarvu:135: puruṣe upacāra eva bhogāpavargayoḥ prakṛtigatayorapi vivekāgrahāt puruṣasambandhaḥ susādhito bhavati /
GSP31ttssarvu:137: pratyātmānaṃ badhnāti tattvajñānena vivekakhyātyā ekena rūpeṇa vimocayati itīdṛśasya
GSP31ttssarvu:139: kevalaṃ jñānamutpadyate tenānādirapi viparyayavāsanā pratibadhyate tataścādhyavasāyābhimānasaṅkalpālocanāni
GSP31ttssarvu:140: antarāṇi bāhyāśca sarve vyāpārā ātmani pratiṣiddhā bhavanti ayameva mokṣa iti siddhāntaḥ // 21 //
GSP31ttssarvu:141: nanu puruṣaprakṛtyādīnāmalakṣyāṇāṃ lakṣyāṇāṃ ca ghaṭapaṭādīnāmakhilaprameyāṇāṃ laukikaiḥ kathamanubhavo vidheyo 'ta āha /
GSP31ttssarvu:143: asandigdhāviparītānadhigataviṣayā cittavṛttirbodhaśca pauruṣeyaḥ phalaṃ pramā tasyāḥ karaṇaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP31ttssarvu:150: ekasmiṃstriguṇātmatattvayutito jātā dvidhā sāpyato dvitvaṃ prāpya prakāśayatyavirataṃ bhogāpavargau svataḥ /
GSP31ttssarvu:151: ityevaṃ parisūcayan matimatāṃ mohāpahaṃ kāpilaṃ sūtrāṇāmamalaṃ dvikadvayamidaṃ jīyācciraṃ cetasi //
